beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 8 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name is|murmuring nervously|—’Too bright, too open.’

beats.text: ‘Sh! Freeze. Don't move a muscle, Little man-cub. He is still watching us’ |VS| announced $hero_name while freezing his body with one of his legs in the air.

‘Over there!’ |VS| whispered $hero_name, |VS| ‘Do you see that shadow moving near the $avatar_t_stop $avatar_t_type stop? There is Shere Khan. He is still following us’ |VS| starting to walk backwards.

|VS| After some silence, $hero_name cautioned |VS|, ‘He’s turning away. He didn't see us. Remember: You don't have to be faster than the tiger, just quieter than the leaf. Let's find the next page and vanish.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 8  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
